Much before the alliance talks were concluded with the AIADMK and Tirunelveli constituency was allotted to the BJP, the party’s state vicepresident Nainar Nagendran filed his nomination papers in the segment, sans Form B that gives him ‘lotus’ symbol. Stay updated with Times of India to get all the live updates of 2021 Tamil Nadu Assembly Election News, Manifestos, Candidates list, and Nomination dates.

author: Sean O'Kane
title: Volkswagen of America lied about rebranding to ‘Voltswagen’
description: Volkswagen of America lied about changing its brand name to “Voltswagen,” which was supposed to show the company’s commitment to electric vehicles. Instead, the press release the company posted was part of a marketing stunt meant to promote the lone electric vehicle Volkswagen currently sells in the US.
